name: Calculated hours IS Informal Customer EBI/Photo ID Training
action: <*ASSIGNVALUE(IS Informal Customer EIS (EBI)/Photo ID Training:[IF](<*ISSELECTED(IS_Implementation_Methodology.Non-Standard Build Estimate)*>){[IF](<*ISSELECTED(IS_Informal_Cust_EIS_(EBI)/Photo_ID_Training_Req.Yes)*>){<* Eval(8*<*VALUE(IS_No_of_EIS_(EBI)/Photo_ID_Training_Session)*>) *>}{0}[ENDIF]}{[IF]([AND](<*ISSELECTED(IS_Implementation_Methodology.Standard Build Estimate)*>,<*ISSELECTED(IS_GES_Location.None)*>)){[IF](<*ISSELECTED(IS_Informal_Cust_EIS_(EBI)/Photo_ID_Training_Req.Yes)*>){<* Eval(8*<*VALUE(IS_No_of_EIS_(EBI)/Photo_ID_Training_Session)*>) *>}{0}[ENDIF]}{[IF](<*ISSELECTED(IS_Informal_Cust_EIS_(EBI)/Photo_ID_Training_Req.Yes)*>){<* Eval(8*<*VALUE(IS_No_of_EIS_(EBI)/Photo_ID_Training_Session)*>) *>}{0}[ENDIF]}[ENDIF]}[ENDIF])*>
